entities.name: Bouncy Bug
entities.description: A super springy bee who loves to bounce between flowers — and sometimes right into trouble!

entities.name: Flicker Dot
entities.description: A glowing orb that sparkles and darts around quickly, leaving trails of shimmer behind.

entities.name: Zigzag Zap
entities.description: A cheeky bolt of lightning with way too much energy. He zips around unpredictably!

entities.name: Sleepy Blip
entities.description: A drowsy jelly blob who floats through battles half-asleep… but watch out when he yawns!

entities.name: Snappy Snap
entities.description: A quick-snipping crab who loves clapping his claws to a rhythm only he can hear.

entities.name: Dizzy Whirl
entities.description: A spinning top creature who twirls so fast, it's hard to tell where it'll stop!

entities.name: Peeky Boo
entities.description: A curious mouse who loves hide and seek — always peeking, never still.

entities.name: Shadow Swoop
entities.description: A mysterious bird who glides low in silence. You never see him coming… until it's too late.

entities.name: Puzzle Pup
entities.description: A clever pup with colour-changing spots — solving puzzles is its favourite game!

entities.name: Mix-Up Mouse
entities.description: This tiny wizard mouse casts harmless little spells — but they always go a bit sideways.

entities.name: Copy Cat
entities.description: A sneaky twin-tailed cat who duplicates itself to confuse challengers.

entities.name: Mega Glitch
entities.description: A blocky bug from the digital world who stutters, flickers, and breaks the rules of reality.

entities.name: Lava Serpent
entities.description: A writhing snake of molten rock. Slithers through the ground, leaving glowing cracks in its path.

entities.name: Ancient Robot
entities.description: Awakened after a thousand years, this heavy bronze guardian stomps forward with crushing strength and stubborn defence.

entities.name: Galactic Beast
entities.description: A strange creature made of stars and space dust. It doesn't roar — it echoes through your mind.

entities.name: Psychic Eye
entities.description: Hovering, blinking, pulsing — this all-seeing eye zaps enemies with waves of thought.

entities.name: Thorn Colossus
entities.description: A living rock-armour brute with thorny fists and bark-thick skin. It defends ancient forests and doesn't like uninvited guests.

entities.name: Thunder Lion
entities.description: With a mane of lightning and paws that spark, this roaring lion commands storms and charges into battle like thunder itself.

entities.name: Crystal Dragon
entities.description: A dazzling dragon made entirely of crystal shards. Its body sparkles — but its breath can freeze anything in a flash!

entities.name: Slime King
entities.description: This jiggly ruler may look adorable, but it's got bouncy resilience and commands an army of tiny slimes.

entities.name: Shadow Overlord
entities.description: A swirling dark phantom from the edge of the void. Whispers in the dark are his weapon — and he's always watching.
